channel.title: How do i turn water to lava?
channel.description: hi ive been working on my server (317) and wondering how do i change the water to lava? if you know how please post. ;D

item.title: How do i turn water to lava?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“I am legit I, post:6, topic:349801”] if (i == 1) { i = 1;[/quote]

Looks pointless to set i to one when it’s already one.

item.title: How do i turn water to lava?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_legit_I I am legit I
item.description:
@I_am_legit_I wrote:

[quote=“omfgahippyno, post:1, topic:349801”]hi ive been working on my server (317) and wondering how do i change the water to lava?
if you know how please post. ;D[/quote][b] Or if you have a Delta client go to Class30_Sub2_Sub1
search for

i = 40;

A few lines down it will have something like

if (i == 1) { i = 40;
Change it to

if (i == 1) { i = 1;
There you go, it should work :D~ I am legit I

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn water to lava?

item.title: How do i turn water to lava?
item.dc:creator: @PvPTurf PvPTurf
item.description:
@PvPTurf wrote:

[quote=“omfgahippyno, post:1, topic:349801”]hi ive been working on my server (317) and wondering how do i change the water to lava?
if you know how please post. ;D[/quote]

Use the RS2 map editor, go to toolbox then click paint overlay and color the water you want to change to lava. Make sure you replace the cache in the rs2 map editor to your client’s cache. If you get an error, google RS2 Map Editor, and click the one that links to runelocus, as I used it for a bit of help. PM me if you have any more questions.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn water to lava?
